title: For Preventing Cold....?
detail_text: <:th_ch0103/>Phew.... I worked up a sweat!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Hah, hah.... I can’t.... No more....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Ahaha. It’s over now, so it’s fine<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Don’t “It’s over now, so it’s fine” me! I can’t.... move anymore....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Even if you can’t move, you have to wipe your sweat off. It’s already cold, so if you leave yourself sweaty like that, you’ll catch a cold immediately<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Oka~y....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>I know a gre~at food for preventing cold, you know<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Eh? Is there something like that?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>It’s mikan. They’re full of vitamins! During this season we have lots at home<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Ugh, it’s that time of the year again, huh....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
